Notes: A controller for Flipswitch panels. Individual panels have to be grouped to this object using GroupId. Once all panels have been pressed, this controller will activate a switch, spawn a Power Star or both. A total of 32 objects can be grouped in SMG1 whereas the limit is 128 in SMG2.

Obj_arg0.Name: Completion Cutscene Time
Obj_arg0.Description: How long the game will be interrupted after activating all panels. One additional second will be added by the game.

Obj_arg7.Name: Power Star ID
Obj_arg7.Description: The scenario ID of the Power Star to be spawned. 0 will look for the first scenario entry. -1 does not register a Power Star.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

SW_A.Description: Gets activated after activating all grouped panels.

Group.Description: The group of panels and their controller. The limit of objects is 32 in SMG1 and 128 in SMG2.

AppearPowerStar.Description: Gets spawned after pressing all panels.
